Statement.Sql: INSERT INTO LOOKUP (mUpdated,mGroup,mName,mAbbreviation,mDescription,mSort) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mAbbreviation=?,mDescription=?,mSort=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
select * from LOOKUP where mGroup=? order by mSort
INSERT INTO LOOKUP_XL (mUpdated,mGroup,mName,mXL) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mXL=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
select * from LOOKUP_XL where mGroup=? and mName=?
